name: The Mall Shift
description:
---KriLL--- I wanted to make a game but I had no Game Developing experience whatsoever. But 2 weeks ago I set out to make a horror game. I did not do anything but develop this game for the 2 weeks. This was the end result. Game is in Early Access and WILL get updates.

---Game--- "You are a Security Guard for a Mall and are suddenly woke up by alarms blaring on your computer. The alarms usually mean there is somebody who broke in. You go to find the person but find something horrifying."
